title: Mauritius Five-Star Island Paradise with Exclusive Restaurant
description: The line between a wellness retreat and an adventure playground blurs at Anantara Iko Mauritius Resort & Villas, a stunning oceanfront oasis on the postcard-perfect coastline of Le Chaland Beach. When it comes to dining, you're spoilt for choice. Dine on seafood grilled to perfection at the exclusive Sea.Fire.Salt, or indulge in plant-based delicacies, Mauritian rum cocktails or stone-baked pizza as you please. Meanwhile, enjoy a tipple at the onsite wine cellar restaurant, 1884.
offer_address: Blue Bay Marine Park, Le Chaland MU, Plaine Magnien 51510, Mauritius
